shortDescription: Swipe at shape, on tummy and one hand support
longDescription: {0} is on their tummy, with one hand supporting themself. Place a shape near {0}'s other hand. {0} is able to swipe at the shape, without necessarily touching it.
{0} is holding onto one shape. {0} is able to grasp and hold another shape for a few seconds.
{0} is able to crawl toward a shape, without necessarily touching it.

shortDescription: Knock down tower, seated with hand support
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported with their own hands. Build a tower. {0} is able to knock down the tower.

shortDescription: Knock down reverse tower, seated with hand support
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported with their own hands. Build a reverse tower. {0} is able to knock down the tower.

shortDescription: Crawl forward and knock down tower
longDescription: Build a tower. {0} is able to crawl forward and knock down the tower.

shortDescription: Crawl forward and knock down reverse tower
longDescription: Build a reverse tower. {0} is able to crawl forward and knock down the tower.
{0} is able to bang a shape continually on a surface, such as the floor or a table

Drop a shape to the floor in front of {0}. {0} is able to track the shape with their eyes, without necessarily finding the shape.
Slide a shape across a surface in front of {0}. {0} is able to track the shape with their eyes, without necessarily finding the shape.
{0} is able to grasp a shape in a raking motion, using their non-thumb fingers pushing against their palm.

shortDescription: Hold chest up, on tummy and one hand
longDescription: {0} is on their tummy, with one hand supporting themself. {0} is able to hold up their chest for one second.

shortDescription: Lift head up slightly, chin tucked toward chest, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. {0} is able to lift their head up a slight angle with their chin tucked toward their chest.
{0} is able to roll from their back to their tummy.
